result.email_subject: 54% Off Sailmaker's Signature Seafood Table with Wine and Harbour Views
result.name: Sailmaker Signature Seafood Table with Wine and Harbour Views - Save up to $103!
result.description: Give your taste buds the experience they've been craving with a feast at Sailmaker at Hyatt Regency Sydney, complete with house-made desserts, premium wine and views of iconic Darling Harbour. Help yourself to their 'Signature Seafood Table' filled with a spread of fresh seafood, meats, pasta, soup, salads, roasted vegetables, and much more. Pile up your plate and go back for seconds and thirds!
result.inclusions: Voucher valid for the Signature Seafood Table and a glass of premium red or white wine per person
result.whats_included:
- Access to the Signature Seafood Table spread
- Glass of premium red or white wine per person
- Valid for two or four people
- Available hours: Thursday - Saturday: 5:30pm, 6:00pm, 6:30pm or 8:00pm sittings

result.availability: Available hours: Thursday - Saturday: 5:30pm, 6:00pm, 6:30pm or 8:00pm sittings. Not valid: Public holidays and special event days (like Christmas Eve, NYE and Valentine's Day)
result.how_to_redeem: Bookings are essential via our online booking tool. After purchasing, click ‘Book Online’. Insert your voucher number and select your preferred date and time. Enter your details and once complete, a booking confirmation will be sent to your email. If purchasing via our app or booking at a later time, please head to our website and go to 'My Account' to complete your booking. Book early to secure your desired date and time. Should Sailmaker at Hyatt Regency Sydney need to contact you regarding your reservation they will do so via the email/phone number you have supplied upon making your booking. Please ensure you provide the valid contact details at the time of booking. Present printed or smartphone voucher on arrival

fine_print.title: Inclusions
fine_print.body: Voucher valid for the Signature Seafood Table and a glass of premium red or white wine per person

fine_print.title: Availability
fine_print.body: Available hours: Thursday - Saturday: 5:30pm, 6:00pm, 6:30pm or 8:00pm sittings. Not valid: Public holidays and special event days (like Christmas Eve, NYE and Valentine's Day)

fine_print.title: Conditions of the Deal
fine_print.body: Menu items are strictly subject to seasonal availability. Listed menu is a sample only. Voucher valid for dine-in only. Entire voucher must be used in one visit; unused portions of the voucher will be forfeited, and cannot be used at a later date. Any excess amount must be paid directly to Sailmaker at Hyatt Regency Sydney. Maximum of one voucher redeemable per booking/table. Maximum four diners per table/booking. Vouchers for this offer are limited and subject to availability. No BYO permitted. Not valid with any other offer. Full terms and conditions are located on the terms and conditions page of our website

fine_print.title: How to Redeem
fine_print.body: Bookings are essential via our online booking tool. After purchasing, click ‘Book Online’. Insert your voucher number and select your preferred date and time. Enter your details and once complete, a booking confirmation will be sent to your email. If purchasing via our app or booking at a later time, please head to our website and go to 'My Account' to complete your booking. Book early to secure your desired date and time. Should Sailmaker at Hyatt Regency Sydney need to contact you regarding your reservation they will do so via the email/phone number you have supplied upon making your booking. Please ensure you provide the valid contact details at the time of booking. Present printed or smartphone voucher on arrival

fine_print.title: Changes to Booking
fine_print.body: 24 hours’ notice is required to change a booking you have made. If you wish to amend your reservation, this can be done via 'My Account' on our website within the change or cancellation period only

fine_print.title: Cancellation
fine_print.body: All changes and cancellations are subject to our standard Refund Policy

result.vendor_description: Take delicious, fresh seafood, meat, salads, dessert and more, throw in sweeping views of glorious Darling Harbour, all in the comfortable setting of the chic yet warm environment of the Sailmaker at Hyatt Regency Sydney, and you're bound to be more than satisfied.
result.section_content:
- Whole baked fish of the day
- Array of fresh seafood on ice (all MSC certified and credited), including oysters which the chef will shuck to order, Cloudy Bay clams, mussels, spanner crab, and more
- Chef's selection of carved roast meat along with a variety of hot dishes including rice, pasta, vegetarian hot soup and seafood hot soup
- Extensive freshly made salad selection, like baby carrot and feta, fresh cucumber and dill, roasted beetroot salad, cauliflower and mixed tomato salad
- Charcuterie selection of sliced meats and pâté, cheeseboard, warm bread rolls and freshly sliced sourdough
- Selection of house-made desserts like chocolate ganache tart, lemon meringue tart, berry baked cheesecake, and more
result.changes_to_booking: 24 hours’ notice is required to change a booking you have made. If you wish to amend your reservation, this can be done via 'My Account' on our website within the change or cancellation period only
